verses.roman:
ei-mata kata-kṣaṇa karāilā kīrtana
āpane nācite tabe prabhura haila mana

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; kata-kṣaṇa—for some time; karāilā kīrtana—caused kīrtana to be performed; āpane—personally; nācite—to dance; tabe—then; prabhura haila mana—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu desired.
translation: In this way the Lord had congregational chanting performed for some time, and then He Himself desired to dance.
